Stop.command: curl -s -X POST http://localhost:3939/notify -H 'Content-Type: application/json' -d '{"title":"Claude","body":"Agent stopped"}' > /dev/null 2>&1 || true

hooks.command: if echo "$TOOL_INPUT" | grep -qE '(npm|yarn|pnpm) (run )?(build|test)'; then curl -s -X POST http://localhost:3939/notify -H 'Content-Type: application/json' -d '{"title":"Build/Test Complete","body":"Check the results"}' > /dev/null 2>&1; fi
